title: Devil Beside You - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama   Adapted to Manhua   Female Protagonist   Modern Day
author: Blue Fox   藍狐
description: Jiang Meng, the campus bully that everyone feared exudes an evil aura. Qi Yue, who intended to confess to her long-time crush - Yuan Yi had mistakenly pass her love letter to the hands of Jiang Meng. From then on, her miserable yet sweet encounter began...>
